name: Sickly Spell-Slinging
description:
Made for the Kindred Community Jam #3 - kind of.

A chaotic spell-crafting bullet hell action game. Defeat enemies, complete waves, collect currency, upgrade your spells - but be careful, the enemies might be upgrading theirs too...

Controls:

WASD - Move

LMB - Primary Spell
RMB - Secondary Spell
Shift - Dash Spell
Space - Ultimate Spell
